biocontainers.name: bioconductor-htqpcr
biocontainers.summary: Analysis of ct values from high throughput quantitative real-time pcr (qpcr) assays across multiple conditions or replicates. the input data can be from spatially-defined formats such abi taqman low density arrays or openarray; lightcycler from roche applied science, etc. it handles data loading, quality assessment, normalization, visualization and parametric or non-parametric testing for statistical significance in ct values between features.
